title: (x) "Woody" font
content:
someone help, here is the exact font...where can i obtain a free copy? "Woody" font   
   
 [http://www.havanastreet.com/merchandise.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422235901/http:/www.havanastreet.com/merchandise.htm)

 [‹ Wall Street Journal Font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422235901/http:/www.typophile.com/node/179 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Funhouse" font - House Industries {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422235901/http:/www.typophile.com/node/203 "Go to next forum topic")
author: freehand_guru

comments.content:
Check [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422235901/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/10696.html?1052775226). You're lucky: both Burnstown Dam (Mac & PC)   
and Woodplank (PC only) are freeware. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422235901im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
BTW by the name of this thread I thought you were looking for   
 [Chank](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422235901/http:/www.chank.com/index.php)'s Dong Casual. =D

well, that was me that posted that thread u linked me to, but that wasn't the woody font---burnstown dam is so close though-a little more cartoony looking that the one havana street is showing--can't view woodplank is it a match
